assets.title: Common SQL functions
assets.raw:
-- Datatype
select len(firstname), firstname from users --string length
select len(firstname), DATALENGTH(firstname), firstname from users --string length and data length
select IDENTITY(int, 1, 1) as Ident, * into users2 from users -- create identity column with select into

-- Datetime
select getdate() -- Today's date and time 
select getUTCdate() -- Today's date and time UTC (GMT)
select dateadd(year, 3, dateadd(hour, 2, getdate())) --add to time and date 
select dateadd(year, -5, '2018-10-12 15:10:00.13')
select datediff(year, '1981-02-04', getdate()) -- diff between two dates
select DATEFROMPARTS(1981, 2, 4); --creates date from parts
select isdate('2018-13-12 15:10:00.13') -- Checks if date is correct
set datefirst 1
select datepart(WEEKDAY, getdate()) --Takes part of date as int
--year, month, week, day, hour, minute, second, millisecond
--dayofyear, quarter, weekday

-- Math function
select abs(-5)
select sin(1), sin(1 + 2 * pi()), cos(1), tan(1)
select DEGREES(pi()) --converts radians to degrees
select Radians(180.0) --converts degrees to radians
select FLOOR(4.7), CEILING(4.7), ROUND(4.743534, 2)--round down, round up, round
select power(10, 3) --exponent
select rand(123), rand(), rand() -- create 3 rando values between 0 and 1
select round(rand() * 4 + 3.5, 0) -- random värde mellan ?
select sign(-15), sign(0), sign(37) -- plus eller minus?
select square(3) -- Kvadrat
select sqrt(9) -- Square root

-- Logical
select choose(1, 'röd', 'grön', 'blå', 'vit'); -- välj ett värde genom index.
select iif(1=2, 'japp', 'nope') --if statement, if true, first command executes

-- String
select ascii('A') --Returns ASCII-code for a character
select char(65) --Returns character for given ASCII-code
select unicode(N'庪') --Returns unicode for a character
select nchar(24234) --Returns character for given unicode
select concat('röd', 'grön', 'blå') --Concatenates strings (other datatypes are automatically converted to varchar)
select 'röd' + 'grön' + 'blå' --Can even be done this way
select concat_ws(', ', 'röd', 'grön', 'blå') --Concat with Separator
select format(getdate(), 'yyyy-MM-dd') --Format to nvarchar with C# formats
select left('Fredrik', 3), right('Fredrik', 4) --First X characters from left or right
select len('Fredrik') --String length
select lower('Fredrik'), upper('Fredrik') --Lower och uppercase
select '-' + ltrim('   X    ') + '-', '-' + trim('    X    ') + '-', '-' + rtrim('   X    ') + '-' --Removes starting or ending spaces
select trim('x' from 'xxxyyxxxzzzxxx') --Like trim but with other character than space
select replace('Hello world!', 'world', 'there') --Replaces all occurrences of searchword in string
select reverse('Fredrik') --Reverse
select replicate('hej', 5) --Repeats a string X times
select '-' + space(5) + '-'; --Returns a string with X spaces
select stuff('Hello world!', 3, 5, 'xxx') --Insert a string in another one
select substring('Hello world!', 2, 3) --Select part of string
select charindex('or', 'Hello world!') --Returns index of first occurrence of string search

-- Övrigt
select isnull(null, 'hej') --Check if firt argument is null and if true, replace it
select isnull(dst, '-') from Airports --Check a certain column in a certain table and replace all null values with another one
select coalesce(null, null, null, 'test', null, 'hej') --Returns first value that is not null
select coalesce(dst, time, ICAO, IATA) from Airports --Checks null in several columns in table
select newid() --Generates a GUID
select top 10 * from users order by newid() --Trick to sort in random order

annotations.text: This code creates a unique identifier, data length, and dates from users table. It also includes functions to calculate the number of times in days between two dates using Math function with random values such as abs(-15), sign(37)

The code snippet includes various SQL queries that perform different operations such as manipulating strings, working with dates and times, performing mathematical calculations, and handling logical operations. It also includes functions like LEN, DATALENGTH, IDENTITY, GETDATE, GETUTCD

assets.title: TerminalSettings.json

{
    "$help": "https://aka.ms/terminal-documentation",
    "$schema": "https://aka.ms/terminal-profiles-schema",
    "actions": 
    [
        {
            "command": 
            {
                "action": "copy",
                "singleLine": false
            },
            "keys": "ctrl+c"
        },
        {
            "command": "paste",
            "keys": "ctrl+v"
        },
        {
            "command": "find",
            "keys": "ctrl+shift+f"
        },
        {
            "command": 
            {
                "action": "splitPane",
                "split": "auto",
                "splitMode": "duplicate"
            },
            "keys": "alt+shift+d"
        }

    "copyFormatting": "none",

annotations.text: This is a configuration file for the PowerShell application that allows users to copy, paste, find, split pane, and display power shells.

assets.title: TerminalCustom.txt

annotations.text: Installs Terminal-Icons and PSReadLine modules, then imports the terminal icons from a file named "OhMyPosh".

This code snippet installs and configures Oh My Posh, Terminal-Icons, and PSReadLine modules for PowerShell. It sets up a custom prompt and configures PSReadLine options for improved command line editing.

assets.title: MonokaiDrake.omp.json

annotations.text: This is a JSON file that contains information about the PnPPSHOST, Rprompt and Session. It also includes properties for displaying user names or folders in an HTML document with different styles such as backgrounds

assets.title: Gender based on ID number's last digit.

annotations.text: This code snippet checks if the digit at the 10th position of the ID is even. If it is, it assigns the value 'Kvinna' (woman) to the 'KÃn' (gender) column, otherwise it assigns the value 'Man'
